lines.text: What in the hell are you doing? You made me lose him, numb nuts!

Question is, why you chasing that man for? He's legally out on bail. Now, I'm the law, and I want to know what you're up to. I mean, what is it, Mace? You having an affair with that boy? You switch hittin', you son of a bitch? Baby doll kept her legs closed a little too long? Ha ha ha ha!
Don't you ever... EVER call me a son of a bitch.
Damn! My nose! You broke my nose!
I can't believe this macho bullshit.
